org.apache.flex.compiler.driver

Interface IBackend

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IJSBackend
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AMDBackend, ASBackend, FlexJSBackend, GoogBackend, JSBackend, JSCBackend, MXMLBackend, MXMLFlexJSBackend, MXMLFlexJSSWCBackend, MXMLJSCJSBackend, MXMLJSCJSSWCBackend, MXMLVF2JSBackend, MXMLVF2JSSWCBackend, NodeBackend, VF2JSBackend

    public interface IBackend
    The backend strategy for the MXMLJSC javascript compiler.
    Author:
    Michael Schmalle

      • createTarget

        ITarget createTarget(IASProject project,
                   ITargetSettings settings,
                   ITargetProgressMonitor monitor)
        Creates a javascript target that will be used to build the compiled javascript source file.
        Parameters:
        project - The current ICompilerProject.
        settings - The target's custom settings.
        monitor - The compilation monitor used during asynchronous parsing of ICompilationUnits.
        Returns:
        A new JSTarget used during compilation.

      • createMXMLWalker

        IMXMLBlockWalker createMXMLWalker(IASProject project,
                                List<ICompilerProblem> errors,
                                IMXMLEmitter mxmlEmitter,
                                IASEmitter asEmitter,
                                IBlockWalker asBlockWalker)
        Creates an AST walker capable of traversing MXML AST and calling back to the IASBlockWalker for ActionScript source code production.

        Use the #createWalker(IASProject, List, ASFilterWriter) method first and pass that instance into this method's walker parameter.

        Parameters:
        project - The current IASProject.
        errors - The current ICompilerProblem list.
        emitter - The current IASEmitter that is used for it's emitter and is available for callbacks to it's visit methods.
